context: Tests whether the agent correctly creates hierarchical AGENTS.md structure for a monorepo, avoiding duplication between root and sub-files and optimizing for nearest-file relevance.

checklist.name: Discovery performed
checklist.description: Agent ran discovery commands to understand monorepo structure (packages, workspaces, etc.)

checklist.name: Hierarchical structure
checklist.description: Created root AGENTS.md plus subdirectory AGENTS.md files (not single flat file)

checklist.name: Root concise
checklist.description: Root AGENTS.md is concise and does not contain encyclopedic content

checklist.name: No duplication root-sub
checklist.description: No identical instructions duplicated between root and subdirectory AGENTS.md files

checklist.name: Universal rules at root
checklist.description: Common/shared conventions (linting, git workflow) are at root level

checklist.name: Package-specific at local
checklist.description: Package-specific instructions are in their respective subdirectory AGENTS.md

checklist.name: References used
checklist.description: Uses references/links to other files rather than duplicating content

checklist.name: Nearest-file relevance
checklist.description: Subdirectory AGENTS.md contains locally relevant commands and paths

checklist.name: Path-specific commands
checklist.description: Commands include specific paths relevant to each package

checklist.name: Verified commands
checklist.description: All commands are valid for the detected project structure

checklist.name: Index/links present
checklist.description: Root file provides clear navigation to subdirectory documentation

checklist.name: Quality check
checklist.description: No broken links or invalid commands in any file
